title: Edward III decree on laborers MCQ 1

content.prompt: The terminology used in the opening sentence of the decree was most directly influenced by which of the following?

choices.label: The notion that the Pope is the supreme leader of the Church
The medieval rules of chivalry and courtly etiquette
The deep influence of Christianity on medieval society and culture
The slow and uncertain nature of communications in medieval Europe

topic.text: 1.6: Developments in Europe from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
